name: ArrayStack_searchTest
description: Unit tests for the search functionality of the ArrayStack class.

test_cases.name: testSearchElementFound
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality when the element is found in the stack.

test_cases.name: testSearchElementNotFound
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality when the element is not found in the stack.

test_cases.name: testSearchNullElement
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality when the element to search is null.

test_cases.name: testSearchEmptyStack
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality when the stack is empty.

test_cases.name: testSearchAfterPop
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality after performing a pop operation.

test_cases.name: testSearchAfterPeek
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality after performing a peek operation.

test_cases.name: testSearchAfterPeekWithIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the search functionality after performing a peek operation with an index.

test_cases.name: testSearchWithEmptyStackException
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of peek and pop operations when the stack is empty, expecting an EmptyStackException.
